CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y apt-transport-https lsb-release ca-certificates wget     && wget -O /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/php.gpg https://packages.sury.org/php/apt.gpg     && echo "deb https://packages.sury.org/php/ $(lsb_release -sc) main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/php.list     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y php7.1-cli
Commands.Name: run
